content.rendered:
Princess Barbara is secretly in love with Prince Edward. When the sneaky postman Weasel demands that the king marry Barbara, she flees the palace.

Directors: Viktor Glukhushin. Maksim Volkov

Written By Aleksandr Arkhipov. Dmitriy Novoselov. Maksim Volkov

Stars: Lyubov Aksyonova. Prokhor Chekhovskoy. Aleksey Chumakov
